title: How many text messages can be saved on my phone?
answer:
A conversation supports a maximum of 500 text messages or 50 multimedia messages.  


 To set the number of messages in a conversation, touch **Messaging > ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45315) > Settings > Delete old messages**. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45316) 


 No limit is set to the total number of text or multimedia messages saved on a phone. The total number of text or multimedia messages that can be saved on a phone depends on the free space on the phone.
